T02D3307:3b-1: sthi ra tsa kra bh'a ba na /
T02D3307:3b-3: brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga / bcom ldan 'das
T02D3307:3b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3307:3b-5: // thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis //
T02D3307:3b-6: sangs rgyas kun ltar dbyer med pa'i //
T02D3307:3b-7: dam pa'i lam ston lta bu yi //
T02D3307:3b-8: sku yi rnam pa 'chad mdzad pa //
T02D3307:3b-10: slob mas legs par rtogs phyir dang //
T02D3307:3b-11: bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa'i phyir //
T02D3307:3b-12: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3307:3b-13: gsang sngags rang nyid len pa yi //
T02D3307:3b-16: lus kyang nyon mongs kho nar zad //
T02D3307:3b-18: lus la'ang gnod par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D3307:3b-19: de ltar brtags nas mkhas pa yis //
T02D3307:3b-20: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3307:3b-21: myur du byang chub rab sgrub pa //
T02D3307:3b-22: slob dpon med par bsgrub mi bya //
T02D3307:3b-23: de bas dad pas bla ma ni //
T02D3307:4a-2: de la re zhig rnal 'byor bas /
T02D3307:4a-3: sa phyogs yid du 'ong ba gang yang rung bar stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3307:4a-4: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3307:4a-5: de la sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par 'dzin pa ni byams pa'o//
T02D3307:4a-6: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i rgya
T02D3307:4a-7: mtshor nub cing yun ring du sdug bsngal nyams su
T02D3307:4a-8: myong bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsams la //
T02D3307:4a-9: bdag nyid 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi go 'phang thob par byas nas /
T02D3307:4a-10: 'di dag ma lus par sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal
T02D3307:4a-11: gyi rgyu las thon te 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi go
T02D3307:4a-12: 'phang la bdag gis gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3307:4a-13: de ltar yang skye ba dang /
T02D3307:4a-19: nang dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las
T02D3307:4a-20: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen
T02D3307:4a-22: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las grub pa gcod par bya'o //
T02D3307:4a-23: de nyid ni snying rje bsgom pa'o //
T02D3307:4a-24: sems can thams cad zag pa med pa'i bde ba
T02D3307:4a-25: rgyun mi 'chad par 'jog par 'dod cing dga' ba
T02D3307:4a-26: ni dga' ba'o // bde ba dang /
T02D3307:4a-33: smad pa ste 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po 'di
T02D3307:4a-34: dag la bde ba ji lta bar sdug bsngal la
T02D3307:4a-35: yang de bzhin du lta ba la sogs pa sems
T02D3307:4a-36: mnyam par bsgom pa ni btang snyoms so //
T02D3307:4a-37: de nas rang gi snying gar aa dkar po thub
T02D3307:4a-38: du yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3307:4a-39: ro // de'i steng du yi ge mu:li khri'i mdog
T02D3307:4a-40: 'dra ba bsams la pa spu'i bu ga'i tshogs re
T02D3307:4a-41: re'i gseb nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba
T02D3307:4a-42: dpag tu med pa las byung ba'i mchod pa sna
T02D3307:4a-43: ro // tshogs pa / aom badzra pushpe h'um /
T02D3307:4a-44: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /
T02D3307:4a-46: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /
T02D3307:4a-48: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /
T02D3307:4a-50: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /
T02D3307:4a-51: aom badzra nee be dhye h'um /
T02D3307:4a-52: aom na mo manydzu shri ye shes bya ba'i sngags
T02D3307:4a-53: kyis byin gyis brlabs pas 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang
T02D3307:4b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa @4b bya'o ;
T02D3307:4b-1: / de nas mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas phyag
T02D3307:4b-2: byas la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs
T02D3307:4b-3: te / snying gar thal mo sbyar nas bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3307:4b-4: gang yang bdag rmongs pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag
T02D3307:4b-5: dang yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci
T02D3307:4b-8: bgyid pa la rjes su yi ran ba de dag thams cad ma lus par bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D3307:4b-9: slar yang sdig pa mi bgyid do //
T02D3307:4b-11: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa gzhan rnams yis
T02D3307:4b-12: dge ba gang mdzad pa de dag thams cad la
T02D3307:4b-13: rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02D3307:4b-14: deng nas brtsams te byang chub kyi snying po'i bar
T02D3307:4b-15: du khyed rnams la bdag nyid lus dbul bar bgyi'o
T02D3307:4b-16: // dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jam dpal dbyangs
T02D3307:4b-17: su gyur nas srid pa'i rgya mtshor nub pa'i sems
T02D3307:4b-19: brtan pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di nyid
T02D3307:4b-20: kyis kyang byang chub chen por bsgrub pa'i lam la
T02D3307:4b-22: bdag gi bsod nams 'dis 'khor ba'i sems can ma
T02D3307:4b-23: lus pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra bar gyur cig
T02D3307:4b-24: ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3307:4b-25: de nas 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams ba spu'i bu
T02D3307:4b-26: ga rnams nas mu:de nyid la zhugs par bsams la
T02D3307:4b-27: / aom badzra mu:zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3307:4b-28: de nas aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shud dho&amp ;
T02D3307:4b-29: ham zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di brjod nas rgyu ba
T02D3307:4b-30: dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams dang bcad nyid
T02D3307:4b-31: kyang sgyu ma lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3307:4b-32: de yang sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu
T02D3307:4b-33: la sogs dngos po gcig las glang po che dang
T02D3307:4b-34: / rta la sogs pa ston yang de rnams de
T02D3307:4b-35: na yod pa ma yin gyi 'khrul ba 'ba' zhig
T02D3307:4b-36: tu zad la 'khrul pa de yang brtags nas dngos
T02D3307:4b-37: / po med de // de bas na snang du zin kyang yod pa ma yin la //
T02D3307:4b-38: dngos po'i tshogs thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes
T02D3307:4b-39: de ltar rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos
T02D3307:4b-40: par byas la / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na
T02D3307:4b-41: badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i
T02D3307:4b-43: 'di brjod pa'i rjes thogs kha na la rgyu ba
T02D3307:4b-44: dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po dang bdag nyid kyang
T02D3307:5a-1: bsgom la sems tsam du gnas par bsgoms nas sems de yang yod par mi brtag go //
T02D3307:5a-2: de nas snying rje chen po can gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'phen shugs kyis langs nas /
T02D3307:5a-3: kye ma sems can 'di dag rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D3307:5a-4: par dag pa yin yang ma rtogs pas da dung
T02D3307:5a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams par gyur gyi //
T02D3307:5a-6: des na de las stod pa nyid du gnas pas
T02D3307:5a-7: phan mi thogs pas gnyis su dmigs su med kyang
T02D3307:5a-8: snying rje chen po'i dbang gis re zhig 'jam pa'i
T02D3307:5a-9: dbyangs su gyur bar bya'o zhes rnam par bsams la
T02D3307:5a-10: rang gi sems yongs su gyur ba las byung ba'i
T02D3307:5a-11: yi ge mu: dmar po de las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3307:5a-12: 'khor rgya skyegs kyi me tog gsar ba'i mdog can
T02D3307:5a-13: du gyur la / de'i sten du dbyangs kyi yi
T02D3307:5a-14: ge kha dog dmar po nyis 'gyur byas pa las
T02D3307:5a-15: mgo gyen du bltas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3307:5a-16: de'i steng du yi ge mu:gnyis pa kha dog dmar
T02D3307:5a-17: po can las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam
T02D3307:5a-18: par bya'o // de'i steng du ka nas ksha'i mthar
T02D3307:5a-19: thug pa la da dha da dha ya la zhes
T02D3307:5a-20: bya ba'i yi ges bsnan pa nyis 'gyur du byas
T02D3307:5a-21: pa'i yi ge brgyad cu mgo gyen du bltas pa
T02D3307:5a-22: mdog rnam par dmar ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D3307:5a-23: de'i steng du yi ge mu:gsum pa yongs su gyur
T02D3307:5a-24: pa las autpa la shin tu sngo ba de'i lte
T02D3307:5a-25: bar yi ge mu:bzhi pa kha dog rnam par dmar
T02D3307:5a-27: de nas de rnams las 'od zer byung bas nam mkha'i gtos khyab par spros la /
T02D3307:5a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa ba spu'i bu ga'i gseb nas thugs kar zhugs te /
T02D3307:5a-29: de rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /
T02D3307:5a-30: lhan cig tu ro gcig par gyur nas ba slu'i
T02D3307:5a-31: bu ga nas slar log ste de rnams nyid la
T02D3307:5a-33: de nas de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa
T02D3307:5a-34: las 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi sku bandu ka'i
T02D3307:5a-36: chos chen po'i tshon gyis bsgyur ba lta bu padma'i
T02D3307:5a-37: steng du rgol ba ma lus pa'i snying gnon pa
T02D3307:5a-38: lta bu'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3307:5a-39: du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3307:5a-41: da ltar byung ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa 'dzin
T02D3307:5a-42: pa'i tshul gyis phyag g-yon pas thugs kar glegs bam
T02D3307:5b-0: bsnams pa / 'gro ba @5b ma lus pa'i mi
T02D3307:5b-1: shes pa'i ri bo 'jig par mdzad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D3307:5b-2: phyag g-yas pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D3307:5b-3: zur phung lnga dang ldan pa gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02D3307:5b-4: mi bskyod pa dbu la bzhugs pa'i cod pan 'chang
T02D3307:5b-5: ba sgeg pa'i nyams kyis gnas shing gcig pur 'gro
T02D3307:5b-6: ba bla zhi ba thugs rje la gcig tu gzhol
T02D3307:5b-7: ba / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gzhir gyur bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3307:5b-8: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge mu:dmar po
T02D3307:5b-9: yongs su gyur ba las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D3307:5b-10: bsgom par bya'o // 'khor lo'i shar dang /
T02D3307:5b-12: byang gi rtsibs la aa ra pa tsa zhes bya
T02D3307:5b-13: ba'i yi ge bzhi go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3307:5b-14: du bsams la / dbus su yi ge na'o //
T02D3307:5b-16: rlung dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni pra pan tsa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin bsam mo //
T02D3307:5b-17: rtsibs rnams kyi bar mtshams su dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug las gnyis gnyis so //
T02D3307:5b-18: 'khor lo'i mu khyud la ka la sogs pa'i yi
T02D3307:5b-19: ge g-yas nas kun nas bskor bar bsgom par bya'o
T02D3307:5b-20: // 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mdog gi mdangs dang 'dra'o //
T02D3307:5b-21: de nas snying ga na gnas pa'i 'khor lo las
T02D3307:5b-22: byung ba'i 'od zer rtse mo lcags kyu dang 'dra
T02D3307:5b-23: ba rnams kyis gdod ma nas yang dag par grub
T02D3307:5b-24: pa'i brtan pa'i 'khor lo spyan drangs la de dang
T02D3307:5b-25: lhan cig tu 'dres par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o
T02D3307:5b-26: // de'i rjes la 'khor lo'i yi ge'i tshogs rnams
T02D3307:5b-27: las 'od zer dmar po'i rnam pa ba spu'i bu
T02D3307:5b-29: brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i gzugs su gyur pas nam mkha'i gtos khyab par bsgoms te /
T02D3307:5b-30: des reg pa tsam gyis sems can gyi tshogs rnams
T02D3307:5b-31: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gzugs su byas nas sangs rgyas
T02D3307:5b-32: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bas bu'i
T02D3307:5b-33: bu gnas 'od zer gyi gzugs kyis thugs kar zhugs
T02D3307:5b-34: te / de rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D3307:5b-35: kyi tshogs dang lhan cig tu ro gcig par gyur
T02D3307:5b-36: nas de nyid nas slar byung nas 'phags pa 'jam
T02D3307:5b-37: pa'i dbyangs kyi skus nam mkha' ngos ma lus pa
T02D3307:5b-38: khyab par mdzad nas slar byon nas sems can gyi
T02D3307:5b-39: tshogs ma lus pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sku lta
T02D3307:5b-40: bur mdzad nas nyid kyi sku'i thad du lhags te
T02D3307:6a-1: bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nga rgyal
T02D3307:6a-2: shin tu brtan pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D3307:6a-3: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pa ji srid skyo
T02D3307:6a-4: bar ma gyur gyi bar du de srid du rgyun
T02D3307:6a-6: gal te skyo bar gyur na 'od zer bsdus nas
T02D3307:6a-7: spro bar mi bya bar 'khor lo dang yi ge
T02D3307:6a-9: rang gi phyag mtshan dang dbyibs kyi tshul la rtog cing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3307:6a-10: de la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags ni /
T02D3307:6a-11: aom aa ra pa tsa na mu: zhes bya'o //
T02D3307:6a-12: nyin dang mtshan mo bsgom pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D3307:6a-13: gang tshe 'khor lo gsal bar gyur pa dang //
T02D3307:6a-14: rang gi lha yi gzugs kyi nga rgyal ni //
T02D3307:6a-15: g-yo ba med pa nyid du gyur pa ni //
T02D3307:6a-16: bstan bcos nub par gyur pa ji snyed dang //
T02D3307:6a-17: gang zhig 'jig rten du ni ring gnas 'gyur //
T02D3307:6a-18: bstan bcos gang zhig de ltar gnas pa dang //
T02D3307:6a-19: srog chags rnams kyi skad ni ma lus dang //
T02D3307:6a-20: bzod dang sgyu rtsal la sogs mkhas gang dang //
T02D3307:6a-21: de las gzhan pa'i dbang po las 'das gang //
T02D3307:6a-22: de dag thams cad tshig don bcas par go //
T02D3307:6a-23: snying la gzugs brnyan tshul du gnas par 'gyur //
T02D3307:6a-24: phyogs gang tshar bcad pa dang sgrub 'dod pa //
T02D3307:6a-25: 'bad pa med pa nyid du 'jug 'gyur te //
T02D3307:6a-26: phur bu lha chen brgya byin tshangs pas kyang //
T02D3307:6a-27: tshar chod sgrub pa de ni rgol mi nus //
T02D3307:6a-28: 'khor lo 'di med par ni shes rab dag / rno bar mi 'gyur de med phra ba yis //
T02D3307:6a-29: chos rnams 'dzin par mi nus de med par //
T02D3307:6a-30: nam yang 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol mi nus //
T02D3307:6a-31: de bas rang la phan 'dogs pas //
T02D3307:6a-32: 'khor lo bsgom pa mi spang zhing //
T02D3307:6a-33: gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yang //
T02D3307:6a-34: mnyam par bzhag pas rtag tu bya //
T02D3307:6a-35: bdag gi dge ba 'di yis srid gsum las byung 'jig rten rnams //
T02D3307:6a-36: bde gshegs ma lus thugs dang gcig 'gyur 'jam dbyangs
T02D3307:6a-37: 'dra bar shog / bdag dang rnam rtog mang po'i
T02D3307:6a-38: tshogs bral bde mchog ldan pa yi //
T02D3307:6a-39: phyag rgya chen po dngos grub tshogs 'dis tshe 'dir
T02D3307:6a-40: myur thob shog / bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs
T02D3307:6a-41: kyi sgrub thabs brtan pa'i 'khor lo sgom pa zhes
T02D3307:6b-0: // / @6b rgya gar gyi mkhan po b'irya bha dra dang
